name: Super Candy Business
description:
Super Candy Business! 

___________________________________________

Click the Candy to get Candy

Click the Sell Button to Sell your Candy for $

Use the $ to buy Upgrades

Become the Wealthiest Candy Shop Owner

___________________________________________

Use the Up and Down Arrow Keys to Move in the Shop

Each Upgrade has its own benefit, and Its Max Level

___________________________________________

Enjoy!
